(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ third) (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ Japanese) (NN Cooking) (NN Series)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
det(part-4, the-2)
amod(part-4, third-3)
pobj(In-1, part-4)
prep(part-4, of-5)
poss(Series-9, our-6)
amod(Series-9, Japanese-7)
nn(Series-9, Cooking-8)
pobj(of-5, Series-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD accompany)
      (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Tom))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT the) (NN supermarket)))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP he))
          (VP (VBZ tells)
            (NP (PRP us))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (CD three) (JJ key) (NNS ingredients))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (JJ Japanese) (NN cooking)))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(accompany-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, accompany-2)
nn(Tom-4, Chef-3)
dobj(accompany-2, Tom-4)
prep(accompany-2, to-5)
det(supermarket-7, the-6)
pobj(to-5, supermarket-7)
advmod(tells-10, where-8)
nsubj(tells-10, he-9)
advcl(accompany-2, tells-10)
dobj(tells-10, us-11)
prep(tells-10, about-12)
det(ingredients-16, the-13)
num(ingredients-16, three-14)
amod(ingredients-16, key-15)
pobj(about-12, ingredients-16)
prep(ingredients-16, of-17)
amod(cooking-19, Japanese-18)
pobj(of-17, cooking-19)

  (S
    (NP (NNP namely))
    (VP (VBZ shoyu))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, shoyu-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB mirin)
      (CC and)
      (VB sake))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, mirin-1)
cc(mirin-1, and-2)
conj(mirin-1, sake-3)


(ROOT
  (SINV (VBZ Then)
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VB head)
      (PRT (RP back))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT the) (NN kitchen)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Chawanmushi))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (NP
                          (NP (CD one))
                          (PP (IN of)
                            (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS kids) ('' '))))))))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, Then-1)
nsubj(Then-1, we-2)
dep(Then-1, head-3)
prt(head-3, back-4)
prep(head-3, to-5)
det(kitchen-7, the-6)
pobj(to-5, kitchen-7)
aux(make-9, to-8)
infmod(kitchen-7, make-9)
dobj(make-9, Chawanmushi-10)
nsubj(one-13, which-11)
cop(one-13, is-12)
rcmod(Chawanmushi-10, one-13)
prep(one-13, of-14)
poss(kids-16, my-15)
pobj(of-14, kids-16)


(ROOT
  (NP (NN favorite) (NNS dishes) (. .)))


nn(dishes-2, favorite-1)
root(ROOT-0, dishes-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN key))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NNP Chawanmushi))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB ensure)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (S
                  (NP (EX there))
                  (VP (VBP are)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT no) (NNS bubbles))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT the) (NN custard))))))
                (CC and)
                (S
                  (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Tom))
                  (VP (VBZ shows)))))))))))


det(key-2, The-1)
nsubj(is-7, key-2)
prep(key-2, to-3)
det(Chawanmushi-6, a-4)
amod(Chawanmushi-6, great-5)
pobj(to-3, Chawanmushi-6)
root(ROOT-0, is-7)
aux(ensure-9, to-8)
xcomp(is-7, ensure-9)
mark(are-12, that-10)
expl(are-12, there-11)
ccomp(ensure-9, are-12)
det(bubbles-14, no-13)
nsubj(are-12, bubbles-14)
prep(bubbles-14, in-15)
det(custard-17, the-16)
pobj(in-15, custard-17)
cc(are-12, and-18)
nn(Tom-20, Chef-19)
nsubj(shows-21, Tom-20)
conj(are-12, shows-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP us))
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB how)
        (ADJP (JJ simple)))
      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP (DT this))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NN home)))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(is-5, us-1)
advmod(is-5, how-2)
dep(how-2, simple-3)
nsubj(is-5, it-4)
root(ROOT-0, is-5)
aux(make-7, to-6)
xcomp(is-5, make-7)
dobj(make-7, this-8)
prep(make-7, at-9)
pobj(at-9, home-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (CD one) (NN bowl))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNS chawanmushi)))))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP buy)
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (DT the) (NN restaurant))
        (, ,)))))

num(bowl-4, one-3)

prep(bowl-4, of-5)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN amazed)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how)
              (ADJP (JJ simple)))
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (ADVP (RB really))
              (VP (VBZ is)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubjpass(amazed-4, You-1)
aux(amazed-4, would-2)
auxpass(amazed-4, be-3)
root(ROOT-0, amazed-4)
advmod(is-9, how-5)
dep(how-5, simple-6)
nsubj(is-9, it-7)
advmod(is-9, really-8)
ccomp(amazed-4, is-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBZ 's) (RB not)
        (VP (VBN stated)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NN video))))))
    (CC but)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN proportion))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NN egg))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (NNS dashi))))))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (CD 1) (NN egg))
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP
              (NP (DT half) (NN cup))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (JJ dashi) (NN stock))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(stated-4, It-1)
auxpass(stated-4, 's-2)
neg(stated-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, stated-4)
prep(stated-4, in-5)
det(video-7, the-6)
pobj(in-5, video-7)
cc(stated-4, but-8)
det(proportion-10, the-9)
nsubj(egg-17, proportion-10)
prep(proportion-10, of-11)
pobj(of-11, egg-12)
prep(egg-12, to-13)
pobj(to-13, dashi-14)
cop(egg-17, is-15)
num(egg-17, 1-16)
conj(stated-4, egg-17)
prep(egg-17, to-18)
det(cup-20, half-19)
pobj(to-18, cup-20)
prep(cup-20, of-21)
amod(stock-23, dashi-22)
pobj(of-21, stock-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Dashi) (NN stock))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN covered)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (JJ previous) (NN video))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (NNP Miso) (NNP Soup)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP need)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB bring)
            (NP (DT the) (NN water))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN boil)
                  (CC and)
                  (NN steam))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (CD 15) (NNS mins)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(need-2, you-1)
root(ROOT-0, need-2)
aux(bring-4, to-3)
xcomp(need-2, bring-4)
det(water-6, the-5)
dobj(bring-4, water-6)
prep(bring-4, to-7)
det(boil-9, the-8)
pobj(to-7, boil-9)
cc(boil-9, and-10)
conj(boil-9, steam-11)
prep(boil-9, for-12)
num(mins-14, 15-13)
pobj(for-12, mins-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN rest))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ ieatvideos) (JJ please) (NN click)))))
    (NP (RB here))
    (: :)))


prep(here-9, For-1)
det(rest-3, the-2)
pobj(For-1, rest-3)
prep(rest-3, of-4)
det(click-8, the-5)
amod(click-8, ieatvideos-6)
amod(click-8, please-7)
pobj(of-4, click-8)
root(ROOT-0, here-9)
